## useUpdate() function

Use `ComponentDidUpdate`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useUpdate(effect: EffectCallback, deps?: DependencyList): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  effect | EffectCallback | Callback to run on update. |
|  deps | DependencyList | <i>(Optional)</i> Dependency list of effect. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
